Our bodies are our own. That’s why Planned Parenthood is taking the Trump-Pence administration to court: to protect access to affordable birth control & reproductive health care. #IStandWithPP
The administration’s overhaul of Title X is not just an attack on Planned Parenthood patients. It’s an attack on the 4+ million people, who rely on it for birth control & reproductive health care.

Time after time, the Trump-Pence administration continues to prioritize:
-Abstinence over contraception
-Ideology over health care
-Control over our rights
#IStandWithPP

Bottom line: what the Trump-Pence administration is trying to do is ILLEGAL and DANGEROUS. And we need your help fighting back — tell @HHSGov to do their job: https://t.co/YDbWERPbGi https://t.co/sK1zshBb1d

If the Trump admin gets their way, they can tell you what to do with YOUR body, like: 
- Tell you what birth control to use (or none at all!)
- Keep people from accessing care at Planned Parenthood health centers
- Implement a “domestic gag rule” to block care for millions

Planned Parenthood is going to court — because 4 million people deserve access to Title X, the nation's ONLY program for affordable birth control and reproductive health care. #IStandWithPP https://t.co/6j38rRK2c9

The Title X program connects 4 million people with birth control, STI testing, and breast and cervical exams. 

Trump's @HHSGov is pushing "sexual risk avoidance," abstinence, and marriage — instead of helping them get health care. See you in court. #IStandWithPP https://t.co/LYF0jq9oV4
